name: DON'T NOCLIP OUT OF REALITY
description:
READ NOTE BEFORE DOWNLOADING THE GAME

WELCOME TO THE BACKROOMS  !

A SIMPLE GAME ABOUT NOCLIPPING OUT OF REALITY AND FALLING INTO BACKROOMS

FEATURES - 

1 - EXCELLENT 3D GRAPHICS

2- NEXT LEVEL POST PROCESSING

3- REALISTIC PHYSICS

4- VARIETY OF GRAPHICAL OPTIONS TO CHOOSE FROM

5- FULLY OFFLINE AND FREE

6- SUPPORTS 90 FPS

7- DUE TO VARIOUS GRAPHICS OPTIONS, SUPPORTS MAXIMUM NUMBER OF DEVICES

8- NO IN APP PURCHASES

NOTE - 

PLAYING AT MAX GRAPHICS IN LOW END DEVICES MAY CAUSE HEATING ISSUE AND PERFORMANCE DROP AND ONLY DEVICES WHICH ARE ABOVE 8 GB RAM AND A GOOD PROCESSOR (SNAPDRAGON 888 +) CAN PLAY THE GAME IN HIGHEST GRAPHICS

LOW END PHONES ARE RECOMMENDED TO DECREASE THE RESOLUTION BEFORE PLAYING THE GAME

ENJOY
